translation.en: [reporter on TV] Five white police officers
translation.it: Cinque agenti bianchi sono stati accusati di aver picchiato

translation.en: stand accused of beating a fellow officer in Milwaukee, Wisconsin,
translation.it: Cinque agenti bianchi sono stati accusati di aver picchiato un collega nero sotto copertura a Milwaukee, in Wisconsin.

translation.en: a Black man on undercover assignment.
translation.it: un collega nero sotto copertura a Milwaukee, in Wisconsin.

translation.en: The officer was working undercover Monday night when his vehicle was stopped
translation.it: L'agente stava lavorando quando è stato fermato

translation.en: on this street for a traffic violation. -[muffled metal grinding] -[TV mutes]
translation.it: per violazione del codice della strada.

translation.en: I gotta say, that smell is worse than ever.
translation.it: La puzza è più forte che mai.

translation.en: Well, y'know, I had that meat that went bad in that little freezer I got.
translation.it: Sai che avevo della carne andata a male nel freezer.

translation.en: No, you said that last week,
and I saw you go out to the dumpster and throw out a whole bunch of bad meat,
translation.it: e ti ho visto buttare della carne avariata nella spazzatura,

translation.en: so the smell should be gone by now.
I forgot. My, uh, my tropical fish died.
translation.it: Giusto, mi sono morti i pesci tropicali.

translation.en: They get this disease. It's… it's called ich.
translation.it: Si ammalano di una cosa che si chiama Ich.

translation.en: Yeah, that's what they call it.
It's something that has to do with the, uh, pH level of the water.
translation.it: Ha a che fare con il pH dell'acqua.

translation.en: Anyway, they all caught it and died, and…
translation.it: L'hanno preso tutti e sono morti.

translation.en: I'll clean it out this weekend.
Can I buy you a drink?
Oh, well, should we let this gentleman buy us both a drink? That's awfully forward.
translation.it: Che dici, permettiamo a questo signore di offrirci da bere? Decisamente diretto.
E ci offre pure birra scarsa.

translation.en: He must be a real player.
You bought me a drink before. You know that, right?
translation.it: Mi hai già offerto da bere. Lo sai, vero?

translation.en: There ain't a lot of white queens walking up in here with their blond hair.
translation.it: Non ci sono tante troiette bianche coi capelli biondi, qui dentro.

translation.en: You bought me a beer too. Last time I was in here, just last week.
translation.it: Anche a me hai offerto da bere. L'ultima volta che sono venuto.

translation.en: Didn't even make a move. Did he?
translation.it: Ma non ci ha provato, vero?

translation.en: Well, then, uh, one more for my other friend here.
translation.it: Beh, allora, un'altra per il mio amico qui.

translation.en: How long you been drinking tonight, sweetheart?
Well, thank you for the beer, uh…
Jeff, I'm Aaron. This is Don and Tracy.
translation.it: Jeff, io sono Aaron e loro Don e Tracy.

translation.en: So you gonna make a move on one of us, player?
translation.it: Quindi ci proverai con uno di noi?

translation.en: Or you gonna walk off like last time?
translation.it: O te ne andrai di nuovo?

translation.en: Tonight I'm a man of action.
What does that mean, if you're a fine arts photographer?
translation.it: Che significa che sei un fotografo artistico?

translation.en: You make, like, portraits and shit?
translation.it: Che fai ritratti o roba così?

translation.en: It's, like, art photography. Artsy stuff.
translation.it: È come la fotografia d'arte. Roba da artistoidi.

translation.en: You guys wanna pose for me, I could give you 50 bucks.
translation.it: Se volete posare per me, vi do 50 dollari.

translation.en: Are you asking all of us?
Yeah. All you could do it.
I'm not dropping my drawers for no $50.
translation.it: Non mi calo le braghe per 50 dollari.

translation.en: Really good bone structure, I can tell.
I saw you out on the dance floor. The light was hitting it, I could tell.
translation.it: Ti ho visto sulla pista da ballo. La luce la colpiva.

translation.en: [Tracy] Bitch, my landlord jacked up the rent. So what the fuck? Don't see y'all offering me no $50.
translation.it: Mi hanno aumentato l'affitto. Quindi, sono pur sempre 50 dollari.

translation.en: [man] All right. Well, maybe we'll stop by later.
Oh, I live just up the street.
[Jeffrey] What kind of work you do?
That's the problem. I don't really have a career. It's like, this job, that job.
translation.it: È questo il problema. Non ho una carriera, faccio di tutto.

translation.en: I thought you said you had a house.
No, I just said that. I didn't want them bothering us.
translation.it: No, l'ho detto solo per non farci disturbare.

translation.en: My family sent me a bunch of meat.
translation.it: La mia famiglia mi ha mandato della carne.

translation.en: But I forgot to plug that little freezer in.
[Tracy] Well, shit. Can I open a window?
I don't like opening them up 'cause of the noise.
translation.it: non mi piace aprirle per il rumore.

translation.en: But I, uh… I have an air conditioner.
What is that floatin' in there?
No, that's probably just dish soap or something like that.
translation.it: Sarà del sapone per i piatti.

translation.en: Sorry, man. I think I'm gonna go.
translation.it: Scusa, amico. Penso che me ne andrò.

translation.en: Why does everybody always wanna leave me?
What you mean, leave you? I need some fresh air. It stinks in here.
translation.it: Che vuol dire, lasciarti? Devo respirare aria fresca, qui puzza.

translation.en: Well, hey, I said I'd turn on the air conditioner.
translation.it: Ho detto che avevo il condizionatore.

translation.en: In the bedroom. Okay, well, go turn it on.
translation.it: - In camera da letto. - Va bene, accendilo, allora.

translation.en: Well, I wanna show you around first.
translation.it: Voglio farti fare un giro, prima.

translation.en: Gotta have a little funeral for him.
You're not supposed to put two of 'em in the same tank.
translation.it: non se ne dovrebbero mettere due insieme,
ma a me piace vederli lottare.

translation.en: What are you doing? Nothing, it's for the photos.
translation.it: - Che stai facendo? - Niente, è per le foto.

translation.en: Stop! You're gonna make me do things I don't wanna do.
translation.it: Basta! Mi farai fare cose che non voglio fare.

translation.en: All right? It's just for the photos. I was kidding.
translation.it: Va bene? È solo per le foto. Scherzavo.

translation.en: -You're pointing a knife at me! -Calm down and I won't have to.
translation.it: - Mi stai puntando un coltello! - Calmati e smetto.

translation.en: Why do you have to get all emotional?
Just calm down, go in there.
Now, that's where the air conditioner is, okay?
translation.it: E poi il condizionatore è lì, ok?

translation.en: We're gonna hang out, gonna watch a movie.
translation.it: Staremo un po' insieme e guarderemo un film.

translation.en: What're we gonna do in here?
I told you I'm gonna pay you. Okay?
translation.it: Ti ho detto che ti pagherò, ok?

translation.en: Hey, let's go in the other room, okay?
-I wanna watch the movie. -Yeah, I know.
translation.it: - Voglio guardare il film. - Lo so.

translation.en: [Tracy] We'll watch the movie in a second, okay?
translation.it: Lo guarderemo tra un secondo, ok?

translation.en: I have an idea, and I think…
Okay, what do you wanna show me?
I mean, you want to take some photos, right?
But you gotta put that knife down.
You wanna take some photos, right?
I wanna watch the movie now.
We'll watch the movie first, but I want to take some nudes, all right?
translation.it: Prima guardiamo il film, poi facciamo delle foto di nudo.

translation.en: That's why you brought me here, right? All right.
translation.it: Mi hai portato qui per questo, no?

translation.en: I don't like horror movies, honey.
translation.it: Non mi piacciono i film horror.

translation.en: Why you so nervous? I'm not.
translation.it: - Perché sei nervoso? - Non è vero.

translation.en: Are you scared of the movie or are you scared of me?
translation.it: Hai paura del film o di me?

translation.en: Hold on. I'm just gonna skip to the best part.
Can I listen to your heartbeat?
I want to hear your heart

translation.it: - Che cazzo fai? - Aiuto, per favore!

translation.en: [breathlessly] Officers, this motherfucker down the street…
-[officer 1] Whoa. Stay where you are. -He tried to--
translation.it: - Resta dove sei. - Ha cercato di…

translation.en: You high? You take something tonight?
'Cause he tried to fucking kill me.
[Tracy, muffled] I'm telling you. Black people are disappearing all over the city.
translation.it: Vi dico che scompaiono neri in tutta la città.

translation.en: It's just fun and games. You know, like,
he and I, we're both, uh, homosexuals, so… you know.
translation.it: io e lui siamo omosessuali, no?

translation.en: -He wanted to play cops and robbers. -No, I didn't.
translation.it: - Voleva giocare a guardie e ladri. - No.

translation.en: Hey, you let us handle this, okay?
Well, like I said before, we were just, uh, playing around and, uh…
translation.it: Come ho detto, stavamo giocando e…

translation.en: I guess us gay guys can get into that roughhousing frat boy stuff.
translation.it: A volte noi gay diventiamo un po' irruenti.

translation.en: Do you have the key to the handcuffs? Yes.
translation.it: - Hai la chiave delle manette? - Sì.

translation.en: Yeah, they're-- It's somewhere in here. I just, uh…
translation.it: Sì, sono in casa, da qualche parte.

translation.en: I think it might be in a drawer. Um…
I'll find it. I'll be right back.
You mind if we come in?
-You want to come in? -Hell no. I'm staying right here.
translation.it: - Vuoi entrare? - Col cavolo. Io resto qui.

translation.en: I really like cooking pork chops,
and family sent me a bunch of meat, but it all went bad.
translation.it: La mia famiglia mi ha mandato della carne ma è andata a male.

translation.en: -Is there anyone else here right now? -No.
translation.it: - C'è qualcun altro qui con te? - No.

translation.en: Where's this key, do you think?
I think it might be in the bedroom.
translation.it: Credo che sia in camera da letto.

translation.en: I'll find it. -There's a bunch of gay stuff in there. -Hey, we'll take a look.
translation.it: - La cerco. C'è roba da gay lì. - Diamo un'occhiata.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I think it's, uh…
[officer 2] Sir, you're under arrest for the attempted murder…
translation.it: Ti dichiaro in arresto per il tentato omicidio

translation.en: [officer 1] You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law.
translation.it: Hai il diritto di rimanere in silenzio. Ciò che dirai verrà usato contro di te.

translation.en: You killed my people, you motherfucker. [officer 2] …one will be provided to you.
translation.it: Hai ucciso la mia gente, stronzo.

translation.en: -Fuck you, piece of shit! -You understand the rights I read?
translation.it: - Vaffanculo, pezzo di merda! - Hai capito?

translation.en: For what I did I should be dead.
translation.it: Per quello che ho fatto, dovrei essere morto.

translation.en: I hope you die, motherfucker. Fuck you. I fucking hope you die, you piece of shit.
translation.it: Spero che tu muoia. Vaffanculo. Spero che tu muoia, cazzo.

translation.en: All these people been living in here, all this time with the smell and all these sounds coming out of there, and we--
translation.it: Tutta questa gente ha vissuto qui con questi odori e suoni che venivano…

translation.en: -Officer, officer, clear a lane. -Ma'am, back in your apartment.
-I'm not going back in my apartment! -Back inside.
-No, you gonna listen to me! -Nobody in until the detectives show.
translation.it: - No, mi ascolti. - Dobbiamo aspettare i detective.

translation.en: [woman] And it's because I called y'all.
I called y'all, and I told you over and over a million times
translation.it: Vi ho chiamati e vi ho detto un milione di volte

translation.en: that something was going on, and you know what you did? Y'all did nothing!
translation.it: che c'era qualcosa che non andava, ma voi non avete fatto niente!

translation.en: So what did y'all find in there? Huh?
translation.it: Cosa avete trovato lì dentro, eh?

translation.en: What did you find in there?
Yeah, I'll be there right away.
Mr. Dahmer, I'm Detective Kennedy with the Milwaukee Police Department.
translation.it: Sig. Dahmer, sono il detective Kennedy della polizia di Milwaukee.

translation.en: We're going to apologize in advance, Mr. Dahmer. This is likely to be a difficult conversation.
translation.it: Ci scusiamo in anticipo, sig. Dahmer, perché sarà una conversazione difficile.

translation.en: Jeffrey was arrested late last night.
translation.it: Jeffrey è stato arrestato ieri sera.

translation.en: We'd just like to ask you some questions about him.
translation.it: Vorremmo farle qualche domanda su di lui.

translation.en: When you said there was a murder investigation, I thought someone might have tried to murder him.
translation.it: Quando ha parlato d'indagine per omicidio, pensavo avessero tentato di ucciderlo.

translation.en: But he was a quiet boy. He was a good boy.
translation.it: Ma era tranquillo. Era un bravo ragazzo.

translation.en: When his mother and I divorced, it was very hard on him.
translation.it: Quando ho divorziato dalla madre, ha sofferto molto.

translation.en: He just turned 18. He was living alone at the time.
translation.it: Aveva appena fatto 18 anni, viveva da solo all'epoca

translation.en: I'm sorry. [clears throat] I'm sorry for becoming emotional. I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
translation.it: Scusatemi se mi commuovo. Mi dispiace.

translation.en: Is there anything else you'd like to tell us?
When he was young, I think he was four,
translation.it: Quando era piccolo, a quattro anni,

translation.en: And he was never the same after that.

translation.it: E non so se abbia avuto

translation.en: there was brain damage from, you know, too much anesthesia.
translation.it: un danno cerebrale per via della troppa anestesia.

translation.en: You think that it might have, what?
Could you tell me a little bit about what he did?
Who this person was that he tried to kill, I guess.
translation.it: Chi è la persona che ha cercato di uccidere?

translation.en: You're aware that your son is homosexual, yes?
translation.it: Sa che suo figlio è omosessuale?

translation.en: Allegedly, he lured a man back to his apartment and tried to kill him.
translation.it: Pare abbia attirato un uomo a casa sua provando a ucciderlo.

translation.en: and when the police arrived to arrest your son,
translation.it: e quando la polizia è arrivata per arrestare suo figlio,

translation.en: items around the apartment that indicate
that your son has committed multiple murders.
translation.it: che suo figlio sia un pluriomicida.

translation.en: What items? What… What are you talking about?
[Murphy clears throat] I'm just gonna tell you right now, this is gonna be difficult to hear, Mr. Dahmer.
translation.it: Devo avvertirla, sarà difficile da ascoltare, sig. Dahmer.

translation.en: There was a human head in his refrigerator.
translation.it: C'era una testa umana nel suo frigorifero.

translation.en: Two plastic bags in the freezer.
translation.it: Due buste di plastica nel freezer.

translation.en: Another containing a set of male genitalia.

translation.it: e Polaroid che documentavano gli smembramenti.

translation.en: In another drawer, we found a complete human skeleton,
translation.it: In un altro cassetto abbiamo trovato uno scheletro completo
le cui ossa sono state sbiancate.

translation.en: A dried scalp. And then a 57-gallon vat.
translation.it: Uno scalpo secco e un barile da 220 litri.

translation.en: in various stages of decomposition, as well as other body parts
translation.it: a vari stadi di decomposizione, così come altri parti del corpo

translation.en: that he was attempting to dissolve or…
translation.it: che stava cercando di sciogliere o…

translation.en: strip the tissue off the bones.
And, uh, we should just tell you
that based on debris on some of the cooking utensils we found
translation.it: che sulla base di quanto ritrovato su alcuni utensili da cucina

translation.en: and the marks on some of the body parts,
translation.it: e dai segni su alcune parti dei corpi,

translation.en: as well as things your son mentioned to us,
translation.it: oltre che per quanto detto da suo figlio,

translation.en: he ate some of his victims.
translation.it: che abbia mangiato le sue vittime.

translation.en: [Kennedy] Now, we realize that this is a lot for you to process.
translation.it: Capiamo che siano tante informazioni da digerire,

translation.en: So we're gonna leave you alone for a few minutes to, uh, collect yourself.
translation.it: quindi la lasceremo a riordinare le idee.

translation.en: And then, when you're ready, we can keep talking.
translation.it: E poi, quando sarà pronto, continueremo a parlare.

translation.en: [reporter 2 on TV] Some neighbors here had complained of a stench for almost a year,
translation.it: Dei vicini si lamentavano del fetore da quasi un anno,

translation.en: but they never imagined what might be causing it.
translation.it: ma non immaginavano cosa lo provocasse.

translation.en: Milwaukee police were led to an apartment in this building
after they were flagged down by a handcuffed man who claimed he'd been attacked.
translation.it: grazie a un uomo che vagava ammanettato dicendo di essere stato aggredito.

translation.en: What they discovered upon their arrival was almost unspeakable.
translation.it: All'arrivo sul posto, la scoperta è stata incredibile.

translation.en: Numerous pieces from as many as 15 human bodies.
translation.it: Diverse parti di almeno 15 corpi umani.

translation.en: [man on TV] It's obvious that there has been a number of human specimens
translation.it: Ovviamente sono state ritrovate molte prove

translation.en: -found within the apartment… -[dog barking] …and to a certain extent, they're hidden in there.
[reporter 3] A hazardous materials team, breathing from air tanks,
translation.it: Una squadra speciale dotata di ossigeno

translation.en: confiscated a number of items from the suspect's apartment.
Among them, they say, photographs and drawings
of dead, mutilated bodies and a vat of acid.
translation.it: di corpi mutilati e morti, e un barile di acido.

translation.en: Police believe the suspect may have used the acid to dissolve body parts.
translation.it: La polizia crede che il sospettato ci abbia sciolto dentro dei corpi.

translation.en: [cop] Ma'am, you have to leave the premises.
We're asking all residents to evacuate for our investigation and their safety.
translation.it: Stiamo chiedendo a tutti i residenti di lasciarci indagare in sicurezza.

translation.en: Where exactly am I supposed to go?
The entire building's a crime scene. There's toxic chemicals in here that could be a hazard.
translation.it: L'edificio è una scena del crimine. Ci sono materiali potenzialmente tossici.
